Seer Skahi:
Duda-Mara's spirit is preparing us for the eternal winter. Here is your test. The Ketra Orcs, a lower race who betrayed us long ago, and the Varka Silenos are at war. They each have a* Divine Stone of Wisdom*, but you must earn their absolute trust to get it. Bring either stone to pass the test. Which side do you choose?
Ketra Orcs Varka Silenos
